# discord_guild (Data Source)

Use this data source to get information about a Discord guild (server).

## Example Usage

```terraform
# SPDX-License-Identifier: MPL-2.0

# Look up information about a Discord guild
data "discord_guild" "example" {
  id = "123456789012345678" # Replace with your guild ID
}

output "guild_name" {
  value = data.discord_guild.example.name
}

output "guild_owner_id" {
  value = data.discord_guild.example.owner_id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The ID of the guild.

### Read-Only

- `afk_channel_id` (String) The ID of the AFK voice channel.
- `afk_timeout` (Number) AFK timeout in seconds.
- `banner` (String) The guild banner hash.
- `default_message_notifications` (Number) The default message notification level.
- `description` (String) The description of the guild.
- `explicit_content_filter` (Number) The explicit content filter level.
- `features` (List of String) The list of enabled guild features.
- `icon` (String) The guild icon hash.
- `mfa_level` (Number) The required MFA level for the guild.
- `name` (String) The name of the guild.
- `owner_id` (String) The ID of the guild owner.
- `preferred_locale` (String) The preferred locale of a community guild.
- `premium_progress_bar_enabled` (Boolean) Whether the guild has the boost progress bar enabled.
- `premium_subscription_count` (Number) The number of boosts this guild currently has.
- `premium_tier` (Number) The premium tier (Server Boost level).
- `public_updates_channel_id` (String) The ID of the channel where admins and moderators receive notices from Discord.
- `rules_channel_id` (String) The ID of the channel where community rules are displayed.
- `safety_alerts_channel_id` (String) The ID of the channel where safety alerts are sent.
- `splash` (String) The guild splash hash.
- `system_channel_flags` (Number) System channel flags.
- `system_channel_id` (String) The ID of the channel where system messages are sent.
- `verification_level` (Number) The verification level required for the guild.
